channel.title: [508] Please help (2 Q)
channel.description:
How do i change npc's that are saying like: Join our forums. And were in the files i can edit the shops?
It's not in Login.java
Thnx

alright mate no problem, should be in your player.java look for 995 (which is the money item id)

then look for 100000000 which is 100m lol then you should be able to find it somewhere around there

if you cant find it ill make sure to get the 100% complete guide from my home computer im at a friends house at the moment

item.title: [508] Please help (2 Q)
item.dc:creator: @sheercoldpvp sheercoldpvp
item.description:
@sheercoldpvp wrote:

ok to change npcs:

go into your files once in click ctrl+f and on the left side click search all files and folders for the name “.java” without the " then look for npc option

or you can directly find it by going into:

this is how mine is davidscape/io/packets

then open up npcoption1, 2, and 3 search for what the npc says and change it, then save and compile!

shops are supper easy once you figure them out ill walk you through it

again go into your files ctrl+f and search for .java

then look for shophandler.java

open that up and those are your shops should look something like:
public int[] shop2 = {590, 946 - this one is the item id that is selling in shop
public int[] shop2n = {100,100 - this one is how much of that item is being sold
public int[] shop2p = {1, 1, 1 - and this one is how much that item costs

just change them to your liking i hope ive helped

Read full topic
